subject: RE: [junit] A good way to end the day
msgSnippet: ... I don t see why it wouldn t work fine on multi-person-projects. Just don t commit the failing tests. cjs -- Curt Sampson     +81 90 7737
messageBody:
On Thu, 10 Apr 2003, Bernd wrote:

> But AFAIR Kent only recomends [leave last test failing] for single
> person projects (which is what I do currently)

I don't see why it wouldn't work fine on multi-person-projects. Just
don't commit the failing tests.

cjs

Curt Sampson <cjs@...> +81 90 7737 2974 http://www.netbsd.org
Don't you know, in this new Dark Age, we're all light. --XTC
